Name: The name of the language.
MustCombine: Tells the user the number of elements they must combine.
MaxCombine: Tells the user the most elements they can combine.
DoesntExist: Tells the user that a single element doesn't exist.
DoesntExistMultiple: Tells the user that multiple elements don't exist.
DoesntExistJoiner: The word that joins the don't have message, like in "a, b, and c" this would be "and".
DontHave: Tells the user they don't have a single element.
DontHaveMultiple: Tells the user they don't have a set of elements.
DontHaveJoiner: The word that joins the don't have message, like in "a, b, or c" this would be "or".
YouMade: Tells the user they made an element.
YouHave: The the user they made an element, but they already have it.
ComboNoExist: Tells the user the combo doesn't exist and they can suggest a result.
NewsChannel: Tell the user the news channel was updated.
VotingChannel: Tell the user the voting channel was updated.
VoteCount: Tell the user the vote count was updated.
PollCount: Tell the user the poll count was updated.
ModRole: Tell the user the moderator role was updated.
UserColorReset: Tell the user their color was reset.
HexMustBe6: Tell the user that a hex color must be 6 characters.
UserColor: Tell the user their color was updated.
Language: Tell the user the server language was set.
PlayChannelNew: Tell the user a channel was marked as a play channel
PlayChannelRemove: Tell the user a channel was marked as not being a play channel
CatNameBlank: Tell the user the category name can't be blank.
CatNameTooLong: Tell the user the category name is too long.
CatNoExist: Tell the user the category doesn't exist.
NotInCat: Tell the user the element isn't in the category.
Categorized: Tell the user the elements were categorized.
SuggestCategorized: Tell the user the element was suggested to be categorized.
SuggestCategorizedMult: Tell the user the elements were suggested to be categorized.
CategorizeMultSuggestCategorized: Tell the user the elements were categorized and one was suggested to be categorized.
CategorizeMultSuggestCategorizedMult: Tell the user the elements were categorized and were suggested to be categorized.
Uncategorized: Tell the user the elements were un-categorized.
SuggestUnCategorized: Tell the user the element was suggested to be un-categorized.
SuggestUnCategorizedMult: Tell the user the elements were suggested to be un-categorized.
UnCategorizeMultSuggestUnCategorized: Tell the user the elements were un-categorized and one was suggested to be un-categorized.
UnCategorizeMultSuggestUnCategorizedMult: Tell the user the elements were un-categorized and were suggested to be un-categorized.
ViewMoreStats: The message in the View More Stats button.
ElemCats: The title of the /get categories embed.
NameDownloadedCat: Tell the user which category they downloaded.
CatSentToDMs: Tell the user that the category was sent to their DMs.
InvalidSort: Tell the user the chosen sort is not valid in the current context.
AllCats: The title of the embed shown when listing all categories using /cat without a specified category.
